Desc.entry: A registered charity which offers ESOL (English For Speakers of Other Languages) at different levels, IELTS (International English Language Testing System) for university students and professionals, Somali language classes for individuals and members of professional bodies and an IT class. Runs other vocational courses eg sewing and door security. Also provides study support to students in mainstream educationRuns a parents forum and a group translating Shakespeare into the Somali language. Open to all.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 6-9pm (IELTS), Mon & Wed (ESOL classes), Tues 10am-12noon (IT class), Wed 5-7pm (translating Shakespeare into Somali group), Friday afternoon (jobsearch), Fridays (Parents Forum)
